data.title: TV and Streaming Services – Housing and Residence Life
data.text:
TV and Streaming Services

Entertainment 54.2 Comedy Central 55.1 Cartoon Network 55.2 Disney 56.1 Nickelodeon 56.2 POP 57.1 AMC 57.2 Fox News 58.1 CNN 58.2 MSNBC 59.1 ID

Cable television service is provided to all students who live in a residence hall. As an on-campus resident, cable service is available on your TV in each residence hall room and streaming via Stream2 on your computer, mobile device, Roku, FireTV, or Apple TV anywhere on campus.

Access Stream2

Have a problem with your cable, submit a cable work order.

Problems with Stream2 – click here
